channel.title: Comments on: Session Repeat Times Published

item.title: By: John Mackey
item.dc:creator: John Mackey
item.description: <p>Congrats Matt! Instead of 15 minutes of fame, you got like 4 hours....<br /><br />John</p>
item.content:encoded:
Congrats Matt! Instead of 15 minutes of fame, you got like 4 hours….

John

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /> Lots of water, relaxation exercises, open vocal tract, diaphragmatic breathing and a good speech therapist!!<br /><br />Good luck with it all.</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ /> Lots of water, relaxation exercises, open vocal tract, diaphragmatic breathing and a good speech therapist!!

Good luck with it all.
